price: Umusangirangendo we (malayika umushinzwe) azavuga ati “Iki (ni cyo gitabo cy’ibikorwa bye) gitunganyije mfite.”
arabic: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waqāla qarīnuhu hādhā mā ladayya ʿatīdun
